Text:
This is really great work! Is there any chance of incorportating a x64 version of this?

Thanks for your time and effort.

After trying Winshit 8  i'm going back to seven, thanx for this.

Always the same pattern!
Win 95 -> Winshit ->Win 98SE -> Winshit ->
Win XP -> Winshit -> Win 7 ->Winshit
64-Bit? 32-Bit is going the way of the Dinosaurs

I do not have a lot of experience with 64 bit integration.  Most of the tools are different.  Some directories are different.  I'll see what I can do.  I cannot promise anything for 64bit until I get a little more experience, but I'll work on it; as far as I know, the method used would work just fine as long as I obtained all the appropriate 64 bit files.

Anyway, here's to hope :)

It needs to also be done on a 64- bit computer and DVD.  I am still using this install on my HTPC tho!

Sweet job

Hi, i just had to say that people like you make the internet as awesome as it is. Thanks so much for putting the effort into this. I'm reinstalling windows on a friends laptop (it's quite old, only 2GB RAM. But it has a HDMI port so go figure) but I'll keep a look out for your future releases. Thanks again

OK folks, I put in the effort and it was relatively painless.  The 64 bit version is at:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7601748/Windows_7_Ultimate_sp1_x64_IE9_.Net_4.5_Sep5_2012

Enjoy :)
Appreciate the hard work. Many thanks.
Thanks... Please can you make tha AIO version of this pack which includes x64 and x86 in same iso.... and all versions unlocked.... Thanks...

Great work!
Thanks for your time and effort.
Installed no problem, says activated. Thank you for your work. One problem...it can't search for updates. Is this by design? Anyone else have the same problem?
Thanks for your effort, keep up the good work.
Error seems to have been due to incorrect system time and date. My fault entirely, should have Googled first and asked questions later. Great upload, thanks.

I have upped a new 11-in-1 AIO dvd for all x64 and x86 versions of this including enterprise here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7619127/Windows_7_SP1_AIO_11in1_x64_x86_IE9_.Net_4.5_Sep10_2012
Thanks a lot for sharing. I download, burn and install, Im using it now.
I received an update of kb971033 I let it installed, no problem at all.
There are a few updates available that just got hotfixed on sep11, but I will not make a new version of this until the Tuesday patch day in October. So don't fear downloading this for the time being.
